name: Holey Water #BrackeysGameJam
description:
You find yourself in a ship that is about to sink. What do you do?!?

Can you fix all the holes in time and save your ship from sinking?
In this short game, you need to repair your boat that is filled with holes and survive long enough to win the game.

Disclaimer: This game has been made over several evenings during the third #BrackeysGameJam. I am not planning on continuing/fixing the game development of the game.
